H0.text: Applying the varnish is performed by the quality control division of a company that is manufacturing a chair.

H1.text: Assembling the parts is performed by the quality control division of a company that is manufacturing a chair.

H2.text: Cutting the material is performed by the quality control division of a company that is manufacturing a chair.

H3.text: Inspecting the finish is performed by the quality control division of a company that is manufacturing a chair.

A4.text: Inspection is a major component of quality control, where physical product is examined visually (or the end results of a service are analyzed).
